# RequestDescriptor.detectFaceCaptureQualityRequest(_:)

**Case**

A descriptor that describes a detect face capture quality request.

## Declaration

```swift
case detectFaceCaptureQualityRequest(DetectFaceCaptureQualityRequest.Revision)
```

## Getting the face and body detection descriptor

- **RequestDescriptor.detectFaceLandmarksRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect face landmarks request.
- **RequestDescriptor.detectFaceRectanglesRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect face rectangles request.
- **RequestDescriptor.detectHumanRectanglesRequest(_:)**: A descriptor that describes a detect human rectangles request.
